alert.note: Alert for Eastern Clay (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 15 at 3:58PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Clay County through 445 PM EDT... At 358 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Green Cove Springs, moving northwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...Minor flooding due to heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor flooding due to heavy rainfall is possible. Locations impacted include... Green Cove Springs, Middleburg, Penney Farms and Asbury Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
